description: Retrieves information about a gallery Image Definition.

gallery_image_name.description: The name of the gallery Image Definition to be retrieved.

subscription_id.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.

gallery_name.description: The name of the Shared Image Gallery from which the Image Definitions are to be retrieved.
